purpose: This tool lets you scrobble songs and albums you heard on the radio, vinyl or at some place where you need to manually scrobble.
authNeeded: Authorize the application to get started!
logInIsSafe: This is safely done over at Last.fm

about.title: What is this?
about.description: An open source scrobbler for the web, which allows you to manually input songs and add them to your Last.fm profile.

support.title: Support this project
support.copy: Please consider becoming a patron to keep this site up and support development!

discord.title: Join us on Discord!
discord.copy: Stay connected with other music fans and find out when there's something new!
